source: anything except orcabus.workflowmanager e.g. orcabus.manual or orcabus.manual.alexis or orcabus.ui.joep, ...

detail.workflowRunName: <name assinged to the workflow run> e.g. manual--research-workflow-xx2-123

workflow.name: <the name of the workflow when registered with workflow manager> e.g. bssh_icav2_fastq_copy
workflow.version: <the version of the workflow when registered with workflow manager> e.g. 1.2.3
workflow.executionEngine: <the execution platform of the workflow when registered with workflow manager> e.g. ICAv2
